name: @Rotekoppen/CLI-UI
description: A command-line based user interface library for node.js
author: Rodger Combs <rodger.combs@gmail.com> (http://combsconnections.tk/)

scripts.generate-docs: rm docs/ -rf && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json ./ && mv docs/CLI-UI/0.*.*/* docs/ && rm docs/CLI-UI/ -rf
